column2: MediaNews may change this privacy policy from time to time. The revised policy will be posted on the MediaNews Web site. Please check this page periodically for changes.

MediaNews may change this privacy policy from time to time. The revised policy will be posted on the MediaNews Web site. Please check this page periodically for changes. If you have any questions, comments or concerns regarding our privacy policy and/or practices, please contact the Privacy Coordinator using the contact information provided below. Please reference the applicable site.   Privacy Coordinator   MediaNews Group, Interactive   101 W. Colfax Ave., Suite 950   Denver, CO 80202   privacycoordinator@medianewsgroup.com   (801) 257-8782
